website_summaries.verdict: Somewhat loose-fitting, these shoes work well for students prepping for a dance recital, but may not hold up to extended performances.
pros: Shoes run relatively true to size
Comfortable to wear, and durable enough to last through several student practices
cons: Molded synthetic heel doesn’t provide much stability
Fits somewhat loosely on the foot

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I am a jazz dance teacher and when I ordered these I was a bit nervous because 1. I get nervous about ordering shoes online and 2. These jazz shoes were a great price so I wasn’t sure how when quality would be. The show fits as expected and they are great quality and are quite comfortable. I have recommended these to my dancers.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke M.

customer_reviews.title: Dynadans are well made and comfortable. Order your normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is a freshman in high school and she came home on the 2nd day and said she needed "jazz shoes" for her dance class. I didn't know what jazz shoes were so as always I looked on Amazing Amazon and there they were. They fit perfectly, they're very comfortable and our girl loves them. I looked at other brands however alot of them said to order the shoes larger because of the European sizes. Dynadans said order your shoe size. I really appreciated that. I will always get her dance shoes from them, we are customers for life!! Thank you Dynadans, you are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about purchasing just because of the difficulty in understanding the sizing of all the jazz shoes... but I followed the directions and the shoes fir great. They held up in practice and her performance. My daughter reports that they fit perfect and are comfortable. She has a wide foot so that's great!
customer_reviews.author: Cloudy Doo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were purchased for my daughter towards the end of play rehearsals so she didn't have a lot of time to wear them until the end of the play but she said they were comfortable. The quality was good and shipping was fast. They were a little big but she is kind of in-between sizes so we didn't know which way to go - better a little big than tight for her so they worked out well and will be used for next years production. Better quality than her last pair a couple of years ago from another company.
customer_reviews.author: LoveSox33

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Daughter needed a new pair of jazz dance shoes. Her first pair came from the dance company. I ordered these because they claim to be the same brand as the ones I got at dance company. I bought the same brand and same size. However thes shoes were NOTHING like they were advertised. Way too big and wide and looked poorly made. We returned these the day after receiving them.
customer_reviews.author: J Olson

customer_reviews.title: Fit is way off
customer_reviews.text: So frustrating. We ordered the 8.5 which should have fit according to the size chart. Her toes were completely to the end-no wiggle room, too small. So we returned them and ordered the next size up- which for some reason cost almost twice as much- and they are HUGE. Literally flopping on her feet. No way are these shoes only a half size different. It was not just the length, but the foot opening was just gaping. Now to return these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Luck

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my daughter who needs them for theater rehearsal. She wears an 8 1/2 for all shoes, so I purchased her size after taking the size chart quiz, which recommended the 8.5M. It fits well on the width but it is loose on the toe box. Overall, the fits larger than it's supposed to and she is going to have to wear something to give her the right fit. She is happy with the product, but now I know that perhaps an 8 or even a 7.5 would've fit better. You can't have loose jazz shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kraimont

customer_reviews.title: ... and I felt for the price the quality was good. I did not like the foam heel
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit as expected and I felt for the price the quality was good. I did not like the foam heel. I do a lot of dancing and the heel did not feel to provide the stability I need. Probably a really good shoe for children or small adults.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes for the price meaning: they’re usable but not perfect. I only wore mine for performances but my dance partners rehearsed in them and hand to purchase a new pair within two months because of holes on the soles of the toes. They’re not too snug (perfect for me because I don’t like tight shoes) so they will be a perfect fit if you have wider feet. I would say they’re true to your street size shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Happy to purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. I wear an 8 1/2 to 9 in street shoe and I purchased the 8.5 and it is perfect. I'm only wearing them at home for a few hours per week so I can't comment on wear and longevity but for the price, these shoes cannot be beat. The quality is comparable, maybe better, than shoes that have cost double or more.
customer_reviews.author: Ivey Vines

customer_reviews.title: Do not use if in colorguard!
customer_reviews.text: Heel wore down very quickly and started to tear rather after a few performances. I do understand my son used his in a bit more harsh circumstances than what usually intended for. He is in color guard for a Drum Corp, part of DCI. They perform outside on grass or turf. However, other brands we have used in the past at least got thru the performance season and then rotated to back-ups for practice. Tried these cause they actually came in a big enough size for him and he did not have to squeeze and scrunch his foot into them. Should of know when I seen the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennybanana

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter takes a jazz dance class and she wears a size 12. These fit her well and she says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: Not sized properly!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe quality is good for the price the only reason why I gave it 3 stars because the size is incorrect. My daughter usually wears a 6.5 or 7 and this was a 6.5 that was more fitted for someone that would wear a 7 perhaps a 7.5. and it was extremely too wide. I'm not sure if this are for wide footed ppl but it sure didn't mention it. So it's was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are exactly what we needed. My daughter needed the tan color for her recital. We had Black but were unable to find any tan locally. She has a wide foot so we were leery about ordering them online. These worked perfectly, they fit great and have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy these again. They are not sized correctly and the chart is not accurate either.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Glue/coloring smell
customer_reviews.text: This was the nastiest smelling product I ever bought. It took days of work to get the presumed glue smell to dissipate. Otherwise fine but wow. Be prepared if you buy them. You will smell them through the packaging
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but order a shoe size down
customer_reviews.text: They run small but will stretch the more you wear them. My child wear a 71/2 I got her an 6 and it's perfect. She says they comfy. I'll purchase another pair when the time come
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last minute for a performance.. they weren’t the best I’ve ever worn, but they weren’t the worst either. They fit as expected. Very thin material.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Please size up or check size carefully.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and had to return and size up, but was pleased with the return process and the speed that they got the new size to me. The new ones fit well with no complaints from her.
customer_reviews.author: Dbs

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, good fit
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has fitted our granddaughter well and is lasting very well. We expect she'll be able to give it to her little sister when she outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Greer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jazz shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: The vamp of the shoe hits where the ankle turns up into the he leg which makes a a bit unclear mgortable. Wish it were cut down a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Looks fitting
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are used for a Jazz/Hip Hop dance class I’m taking. They were good for the activity, however, I could have gone down a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela T.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price. Was 1st pair for a teen taking dance lessons.
customer_reviews.text: These fit well, ( a little narrow) but otherwise for a beginner they fit nicely and look professional.
customer_reviews.author: VIKTORIA ANANIKIAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice dance shoe
customer_reviews.text: I need a size bigger I guess.. Perfect fit but big toe is rubbing. I will definitely rebuy but a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Gaskin

customer_reviews.title: Bad sizing
customer_reviews.text: Based on size chart we selected appropriate Sz. We bought and returned three times, all too small with Little difference between sizes, and then gave up
customer_reviews.author: Erin Cormier

customer_reviews.title: Fits bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes however my daughter is usually a 10 in the dance jazz shoes at academy but in these she is 8.5 the size 10 was really big. The return process was quite easy and we got the right size ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Size is off
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a great tan color, and look well-made, but my feet just swam in them since they were SO large. I had to return them, but will get a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, specially for the price. Just a little loose, but it fitted perfect. And arrived soon.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you’re paying for
customer_reviews.text: Good enough. We use these for theater. They can hold up through 2-3 plays, which works for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: An ok shoe
customer_reviews.text: The length was good but there is way too much room around the arch of the foot. Fits more like a wide than a regular.
customer_reviews.author: mtaylor

customer_reviews.title: good to order half or one size down
customer_reviews.text: little loose on the width, I ordered 7M, I should wear 7.5 or 8. fits good after a few use since it's leather, it stretched.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe for learner and identical to shoe sold at ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe for learner and identical to shoe sold at the dance studio for half the cost. Size chart does seem to run 1 size too big. According to size chart my daughter was a 6 but had to return 6 for a 5 which fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: David niel

customer_reviews.title: Much too big
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is way off on this. Thankfully they are too big (vs too small) so we will keep them since we anticipate needing this size in 2 years...
customer_reviews.author: LadyJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice dance shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the price, my daughter use them for jazz class.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These jazz shoes are very comfortable and fit well so as not to be moving or slipping while dancing. They have survived rehearsals and performances for one show so far and still look relatively new.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore them for a play. She says not much support, but worked for what she needed
customer_reviews.author: Maples Family

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are made for dancing
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort of the shoe while dancing. It would be nice to have more arch support but it was satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: CJBruce

customer_reviews.title: Great buyer/seller transaction.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter needed them for her drama camp and they were just what we needed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size or two
customer_reviews.text: You will need to go a size or two up. But other than that they fit well on my niece.
customer_reviews.author: Katonya S.

customer_reviews.title: Run extra wide
customer_reviews.text: I buy these shoes every year for my daughter. Normally they run a little small but this vendor sells an abnormal style.. they run extra wide an look horrible on.
customer_reviews.author: JANIRA LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Product was as described
customer_reviews.text: grand daughter loves them Looking good price was right well made
customer_reviews.author: Crapsshuter

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect when I was learning to walk again. No arch support was a help. Now I use them instead of house slipppers
customer_reviews.author: M. U. Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Nice jazz shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my son to wear for a school musical. It saved the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Sen

customer_reviews.title: No great
customer_reviews.text: Returning these - they are either used or cheaply/poorly constructed. Arrived from Amazon as pictured out the package. Hoped they would work, purchasing dance shoes for a growing boy gets expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! CHEAP & UGLY!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cheap, not true to size, and the color is horrible. You get what you pay for. I ordered Capezio's to replace these.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: No Fit
customer_reviews.text: The middle section felt as if I was stepping on bricks
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nikravesh

customer_reviews.title: My daughter like them
customer_reviews.text: She was happy with the purchase as she does dance.
customer_reviews.author: Nese

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: These fit one size too big. My daughter wears a size 9.5 and we need to go down to an 8.5
customer_reviews.author: M.S

customer_reviews.title: Toe box is way too big
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for a musical I was in and they arrived and the toe box way so small. I ordered my normal street size (i'm a 7) and when i put them on my feet i could fit two fingers side by side in the back of the heel, and thats when they fit. I'd recommend ordering a side and a half to a size up for these.
customer_reviews.author: edwardexe

customer_reviews.title: It was worth it because she needed them and that’s all
customer_reviews.text: They are just Soso my wife will deal with it OK
customer_reviews.author: MARKD

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not durable! Not true to size at all. The shoes did not fit snug on my daughters feet, they were big and bulky. I ended up going to a local store getting the same size that I ordered and they fitted her perfectly and snug for her performance.
customer_reviews.author: J 6

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These have an uncomfortable flappy piece in the center. I can will myself to ignore it, but it’s a design flaw and I wouldn’t recommend or purchase them again for that reason. But they were the inexpensive option that I chose.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Turknett

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: These dance shoes are light and comfortable for praise dancing
customer_reviews.author: Kesha

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These shoes always look so cheaply made to me...but they were sturdy enough to last the season for my daughters play. Cant ask for much more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Public user

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand, style & price. I always get this kind for my daughters. They go through 2 pairs a season in this color 1 pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for dancewear
customer_reviews.text: these are well made. have ordered from this company several times
customer_reviews.author: dkayinla

customer_reviews.title: dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: DD needed these for her dance class and they were perfect. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe was fine - needed a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was actually good quality. I read the review that said they fit true to size. Unfortunately, "true to size" wasn't the case for my son. He actually needed a full size bigger, probably because he has flat feet. When selecting a size, definitely take into consideration whether your foot is wide or narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bargas

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs small
customer_reviews.text: The quality was fine the size was wrong and by the time I realized it my daughter had already worn them to her first dance class. I would have just bought another pair but it doesn’t have half sizes and a whole size bigger for a dance shoe is too much.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Jones

customer_reviews.title: Size is difficult to know using size chart
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is true to color. Shoe size is a bit smaller than expected. I would order next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Overall the shoe does fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit the exact size . I ordered a 8 and I had only a little toe room I Recommend that you get a half size for example if you wear a 8 get a 8.5 . Other than that the shoe doesn’t really have that much support but if you need something ASAP then this would come in handy . Also shipping is fast
customer_reviews.author: Shaure

customer_reviews.title: Nice dance shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes them, easier to dance in then sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: ElizaBeth

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these daily at dance and they are hiking up very well versed other brands we’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fits as they are supposed to
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal. I was scared to move away from my usual brand but these worked out very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: L. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: I needed to size down.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a great jazz shoe, but I recommend going one size down from your street size. I wear a size 7 in almost every shoe brand, so I ordered a 7. They were way too big and wrinkle so much. If I had gotten the right size, I believe they would perform better. Please size down!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly and were exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.author: echo kays

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes for Latin dance
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for dance class (Salsa, Bachata, Samba, Rumba, Boogaloo, Waltz, Hustle, you name it!). This is my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: OfDaLion

customer_reviews.title: Great Dance Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nice quality. They work great for daughter (she uses them for her school dance team). Exactly as pictured and described.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Used these shoes for outdoor ColorGuard dance. They fit good.
customer_reviews.author: Nuryloo

customer_reviews.title: Little sis loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my little sis for her dance class she loves them .
customer_reviews.author: Ariadne Barcelo

customer_reviews.title: Soft, unisex sizing
customer_reviews.text: Very soft/flexible dance “shoes”, more like moccasins. Unisex, so fits larger than regular women’s sizes. Daughter wears women’s size 8.5-9, had to send back & order an 8, which is still a little too big. We’ll see how they hold up...
customer_reviews.author: Margaret J.

customer_reviews.title: Dance Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Needs more leg room. Does function reasonable as Dance Shoes
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Go down a size !!
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest going down a size. I’m a 9 and it’s way too big. Never had this problem with any jazz shoes before.
customer_reviews.author: Kailah

customer_reviews.title: Good product for good price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time which was great granddaughter needed them on Monday and they arrived on Saturday
customer_reviews.author: TAZ911

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and look nice even after many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Vermont girl

customer_reviews.title: Good dance shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered twice in 2 different colors. Worked well for my 11 year old’s dance class.
customer_reviews.author: THREASA BRITTINGHAM

customer_reviews.title: Jazz Shoes
customer_reviews.text: by the time my grand daughter started dance it was too late to return worse dance shoes ever way to slippery
customer_reviews.author: Paula Ramanauskas

customer_reviews.title: I just think I did not know how to transfer ...
customer_reviews.text: I just think I did not know how to transfer size to womens. I would say they are about 1 size too big!
customer_reviews.author: Amy D.

customer_reviews.title: hella big
customer_reviews.text: i ordered these a size smaller then my regular show size and wow these are big. my foot is swimming in these. if i shove my hand in the shoe with my foot then it fits perfectly, but unfortunately that’s not ideal for dance. i can’t really comment on the quality but if you’re gonna buy these get them like a size and half or even 2 sizes smaller
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughters jazz dance class. They work great
customer_reviews.author: AK Kuuipo

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured in the ad
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Ordered true to size and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Fit to size
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Shoe was as described and fit to size.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY MASON

customer_reviews.title: Full show, still great
customer_reviews.text: Really good for what I needed it for. It was a little tight in the beginning but then molded to my feet. It's a jazz shoe so I don't expect much support from it. I've done a full show with them and they held up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Never bought Jazz shoes before and freaked out when I saw them as they look small...if you're a newbie don't freak out, they fit my daughter perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gates

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: They are fine for my daughter's jazz dance class - fit just right
customer_reviews.author: Samanta Birro

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like them at all. Very ill fitting. I sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Judy Barsch

customer_reviews.title: These shoes didn’t fit right!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes to dance in for a musical I was in and they were too big and arch was in the wrong place for my plantar fasciitis. I need to return them but my window is over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Really bad product and material. Unfortunately return window expired and unable to return.
customer_reviews.author: ALEXZA RIVAS

customer_reviews.title: Thanks happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: What you see is what you get! Thanks happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter's musical
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed these to perform in the 6th grade musical, and they worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Beattie

customer_reviews.title: They will fit a kid..as weird as that sounds.
customer_reviews.text: It is weird how the sizing is for dance shoes. I bought these for my 9 year old and they fit a little loose, but gives her room to grow over the dance season. They do say women’s, but they are a good fit for my girl.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect. In a fraction of the price we would have paid at the store.
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect. In a fraction of the price we would pay at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Construction
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look like two "left" shoes and are poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: M Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Received as expected
customer_reviews.text: Toe box was a little big. However, fit as expected everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carries bigger sizes but durability could be better
customer_reviews.text: They were great and fit my daughter comfortably. My only issue is she's been wearing to dance since August and the bottom have already torn slightly. For what I paid was hoping they would last one dance season. However, this site is one of the few places I can order a size 10 so I probably will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were exactly was was described. Fit was good and worked great as a pair of dance shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Follow the guidelines for sizing closely
customer_reviews.text: Too large,instructions for return were clear. I put them in the mail today and reordered a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: diane ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11, but ordered a size 12 for safety. I have the nudes in a size 11 and they’re too tight. These fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: LJE

customer_reviews.title: Nice jazz shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. They served their purpose well and the size was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Allinder

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Took me two tries to get the size right. I normally wear an 8 1/2, but needed an 8 in this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Livingston

product_meta.title: Dynadans Women's Leather Upper Slip-on Jazz Shoe
feature_bullets: Leather Upper and Neoprene stretch arch insert
0.4'' Flat Heel for traction and stability
Fabric lining and Neoprene stretch arch insert for both comfort and support
Standard size, corresponding heel to toe length is listed in product description
